name: White Bread
description: A simple and delicious white bread recipe that's great for everyday sandwiches or toast. Vegan and Nut Free.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup all purpose flour (or more for kneading)

recipeInstructions.text: Warm the water to about 110 degrees F and mix in the yeast and sugar in it
recipeInstructions.name: Warm the water to about 110 degrees F and mix in the yeast and sugar in it

recipeInstructions.text: Let the mixture sit for 10 minutes till it is frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the mixture sit for 10 minutes till it is frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, add the all purpose flour and salt and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, add the all purpose flour and salt and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the yeast mixture  and olive oil and blend well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the yeast mixture  and olive oil and blend well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the bread flour 1 cup at a time to knead into a soft dough.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the bread flour 1 cup at a time to knead into a soft dough.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in a well oiled container, covered( with a towel or plastic wrap) , in a warm oven for about an hour. or until doubled.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in a well oiled container, covered( with a towel or plastic wrap) , in a warm oven for about an hour. or until doubled.

recipeInstructions.text: Take the dough and knead it well on a well floured surface for about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Take the dough and knead it well on a well floured surface for about 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough again in a well oiled container, covered and in a warm oven, to rise for about half an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough again in a well oiled container, covered and in a warm oven, to rise for about half an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: Knead again for 5 minutes and let rise(in the bread pan) for another half hour. Multiple kneadings releases and aligns the gluten and gives a nice stranded bread.
recipeInstructions.name: Knead again for 5 minutes and let rise(in the bread pan) for another half hour. Multiple kneadings releases and aligns the gluten and gives a nice stranded bread.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 350 degrees F for 30 minutes or until golden brown and  hollow to touch.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 350 degrees F for 30 minutes or until golden brown and  hollow to touch.
